alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 06 at 5:24PM EDT until April 06 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Thomas County in south central Georgia... Brooks County in south central Georgia... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 524 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Boston, or 12 miles southwest of Quitman, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Quitman, Boston, Morven, Pidcock, Dixie, Nankin, Grooverville, Empress, Brooks Co A/p, Blue Springs and Everett. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for south central Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for south central Georgia.
